radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 5 months post-operation, a new mass measuring 7.3 cm in the right adrenal gland was noted. After 6.5 months post-operation, the adrenal mass disappeared, but recurred masses were noted on the posterior aspect of the right kidney and both lungs. Additional recurred masses later developed in the liver, lung, and brain.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: liver ethoxybenzyl diethylenetriamine pentaacetic acid-enhanced magnetic resonance imaging
radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous enhancement in the arterial phase and delayed wash-out in the delayed phase.
